BookOne.title: The test book for StoryBoard functionality

bo_1.title: Start of the Book
bo_1.text: The book should start from this chapter. The chapter has only one action, which enables you to move to the second chapter

actions.text: Move on to the second chapter

bo_2.title: The Second chapter
bo_2.text: Second chaper, with road back to start, and to forward to the third chapter

a_third_chapter.title: Third chapter, with no exit
a_third_chapter.text: This chapter exists to test a chapter with no ways foward or back

notes.message: The End. Choose the book again, if you want to restart

1.title: Awake?
1.text: You find yourself in a strange cell, the door is open

actions.text: Try to sneak out of the cell

2.title: Something in the dark
2.text: Descending into the dark hallway, you feel something is alive there

notes.message: There is a sharp twang of pain. The End.
